vsParam:
Hey, Lydie. It's summertime.
Is summer about to come to an end?

Yes, Sue.
This summer is quite hot...

... Hmm, yeah.
But speaking of summer... Did we forget about something?

Huh? What is that?
We ate watermelons, and set off some fireworks...

You've completely forgotten about it!
Holiday! Holi! Day!

I haven't been to the beach yet this year!! Well, partly because
my life was disrupted by getting to this world abruptly.

Ah— We lived near the ocean back then...
But I don't think this will happen this year. Just give up, Okay?

Ahhhhhhh!
Noooooo! Holiday! I want a holiday~!!

Ha-ha-ha, Sue is on a rampage.
It reminds me of Nio...

Ocean...
I heard that the oceans in this world are filled with seawater.

The ocean in our world,
has turned into a sea of sand because of the twilight.

Yeah... I heard that our world
once had oceans with blue water...

In this case... hehe,
I can't help but take an interest in the "holiday" Sue mentioned.

I'm opening it. Ah... It's from Amaryllis! "To whom it may
concern... I'll just skip this part because it's too tedious!"

"How are you lately?
Thanks to Rod, I get to enjoy the life on land."

Right... Amaryllis grew human legs after she took a very
powerful drug, right?... Hmm, keep reading.

"Put it aside.
The hot weather will continue."

"Do you want to have a holiday in Eruleum?
Come spend some time by the Ocean of the South..."

"Please come if you are interested.
I shall stop here~ Yours sincerely, Mermaid Girl Amaryllis"

Ah— I see. Going on a holiday...
What do you think, [px]? Do you want to go...

[px]! Speaking of summer, the first thing
that crosses my mind is a holiday!

To spend the hot summer by the ocean, taste delicious food...
and then compose a coastal love song...

Hmm, that's the best arrangement...! For a holiday...!
Hey, [px], you feel the same way, right!?

Am I right?
Ha-ha, [px] knows about holidays!

How could you say that—!
Humph! I'm angry! Holiday! I want a holiday~!!

What's going on, Sue?
Sorry, Sue became...

Ha-ha-ha, it's alright!
Although... I do want to take a holiday~

It has been hot lately, and I'm so eager to cool myself
down in the water. ... So, I've decided. Let's go on a holiday!

Wow~Wonderful~!!
Heeheehee, I'm so glad that I made the suggestion.

Article 68 of the Agreements with Mother!
"Be loud and clear of what I want"!
... You added this one yourself, right?

Let's hurry to Eruleum.
Ah, Ayesha and Logy will come too, right?

Huh?
Hmm... What do we do, Logy?

I just said that I'm OK either way.
I'll go if you want to go, Ayesha.

Escha hasn't returned since she went out for gathering,
and we are not making any progress in what we're doing...

Ha-ha-ha...
So, let's go there with everyone.

Okay!
Heehee~ This is going to be a very lively holiday!

So... [px]!
Let's head toward Eruleum for our holiday~!!
